description.narrative: By end 2021, national, provincial and local authorities have the knowledge and capacity to commit to improving the legislative, regulatory, social and judicial frameworks and strategic and operational planning for health, which contributes to Adolescent Health And Nutrition, Child Health, Health And Emergencies, Health Systems Strengthening, Health â€“ General, Immunization, Maternal And Newborn Health, Polio Eradication. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 1. By the end of 2021, adolescents, pregnant and lactating women, mothers and children 0-5 years of age are using more quality health services in the 10 targeted provinces.

description.narrative: UNICEF contributed to strengthening the skills of national, provincial and local authorities towards improving the legislative, regulatory, social and legal framework, together with strategic and operational health planning, including through training, joint monitoring, supply chain strengthening, pharmaceutical regulation and research and industrialization in the pharmaceutical sector. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:09/02/2020
